# [[time capsule]] {{gloss|sealed container, buried at some location, that contains records of contemporary life - to be rediscovered in the distant future}}
types.html:
capsule temporelle f (plural capsules temporelles)

  1. time capsule (sealed container, buried at some location, that contains records of contemporary life - to be rediscovered in the distant future)

title: capsule temporelle
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /kap.syl tɑ̃.pɔ.ʁɛl/
